title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Todd Herman guest hosts for Rush on Open Line Friday. The burden we carry today is the greatest opportunity for growth. Marxists want to destroy the work of past activists. Conservatives have a chance to show what the alternative is to Democrats. A lot of progress has been made in diversity. BLM, Inc. ideological manipulation makes it difficult to defend the truth. It’s time to see people as American not by identity. Is the NFL aware of what it’s participating in? This upcoming election is about the survival of America. White privilege is a leftist tactic to divide us.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Michael Flynn warns of two-percent control through manipulation and coercion. The burden of the manufactured chaos. Autonomous Zones are a Maoist warfare tactic. There is so much you wouldn’t believe about leftist cities. Let’s declare independence from regressive chaos. People are being conditioned to lack critical thinking. The truth behind the “masks are compassion” idea. Positivity from South Dakota. Coronavirus cannot spread through the woke. Masks are forced speech.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

We declared independence from many things including elitism. The elitists are pulling out all the stops for this election. Gavin Newsom shuts down California wineries except his. Let’s choose the path of liberty. There’s no asterisk in the First Amendment. It’s OK to know we made unwise choices in the past. The United States of America has had the greatest trajectory in history. Will social workers replacing cops get protection? The soft bigotry of low expectations within Democrat-run cities. Bless your family, thank God, and thank Rush on Independence Day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
